price: Ёки уларни ақллари шунга буюрадими? Ё улар ҳаддан ошган қавмми?
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
